title: Mesut Ozil fuels clamour for permanent Arsenal recall with masterclass in Carabao Cup tie at Anfield
text:
Mesut Ozil has often been accused of contributing to Arsenal's most harrowing recent defeats, or deserting the team in its hour of need.

At Anfield last night, it felt like he was being unnecessarily denied the chance to avert an accident by being prematurely pulled from the scene.

When Ozil was substituted 65 minutes into the mayhem at Anfield the understandable displeasure of 6,000 visiting fans in the away end was audible.

Unai Emery explained it was pre-determined to take off the German, who he says will be part of his plans for the Premier League this weekend.

“We spoke before the match and the substitute was planned so he did not finish very tired. It was good to play him for 65 minutes. He did very well.”
description: Mesut Ozil has often been accused of contributing to Arsenal's most harrowing recent defeats, or deserting the team in its hour of need.
